explicitModifiers.text: Your Critical Strikes do not deal extra Damage
You gain Onslaught for 4 seconds on Critical Strike

lines.flavourText: Command like a king and nothing will stand in your way.

lines.name: Mj√∂lner

explicitModifiers.text:
Trigger a Socketed Lightning Spell on Hit, with a 0.25 second Cooldown
Socketed Lightning Spells have no Cost if Triggered

lines.flavourText: Look the storm in the eye and you will have its respect.

lines.name: Pledge of Hands

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 30 Greater Spell Echo

lines.flavourText:
"To shake a hand is to double your power."
- Jaetai, Queen's Advisor

lines.name: Queen's Decree

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

lines.flavourText:
The nobles wanted to take her throne.
She let the peasants take their wealth.
The peasants wanted to take her wealth.
She let the soldiers take their heads.
The soldiers wanted to take her head.
She sat on her throne and wept.

lines.name: Realmshaper

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Fire Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Cold Gems
Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 5 Cold to Fire

lines.flavourText:
"God's creations always begin and end
with flames and ice.
We should count ourselves lucky when we see neither."
- Archbishop Geofri

lines.name: Replica Quill Rain

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Arrow Nova

lines.flavourText:
"How did you manage to lodge arrows in every single test subject
and researcher in Lab Three simultaneously?" 
- Doctor Bircus

lines.name: Replica Oro's Sacrifice

implicitModifiers.text: 30% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge if an Attack Freezes an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
"Ice and flame antagonized in the essence of a prototype.
What once burned now chills the soul." 
- Researcher Arn

lines.name: The Iron Mass

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers wield this Weapon while in your Main Hand

Summoned Skeleton Warriors and Soldiers deal Triple Damage with this
Weapon if you've Hit with this Weapon Recently

lines.flavourText: Lead by example.

lines.name: The Dancing Dervish

explicitModifiers.text: Triggers Level 15 Manifest Dancing Dervishes on Rampage
Manifested Dancing Dervishes disables both weapon slots
Manifested Dancing Dervishes die when Rampage ends

Melee Hits count as Rampage Kills
Rampage

lines.flavourText:
Take your partners by the hand,
Keep your steps in time.
Swing together, spin apart,
And dance with death sublime.

lines.name: The Blood Reaper

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit

lines.flavourText:
To cease the flow of blood is to 
choke the rain in the very clouds.
Both life and land feel the thirst.

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Icicle Burst when you Hit a Frozen Enemy
40% increased Rarity of Items Dropped by Frozen Enemies
(31-38)% increased Cold Damage with Attack Skills

lines.flavourText:
"Please, take whatever you want. Just don't kill me"
"But then I wouldn't have everything I want, would I?"

lines.name: Hegemony's Era

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +6% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff
10% chance to gain a Power Charge if you Knock an Enemy Back with Melee Damage

lines.flavourText:
The right to rule demands mental acuity,
a strong arm,
And a tenacious sense of justice.

lines.name: Reaper's Pursuit

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed when on Full Life

lines.flavourText:
Accept your fate, or lie, pretend.
Death collects you in the end.

lines.name: Chober Chaber

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Melee Gems
+1 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems

lines.flavourText: The faithful may continue to serve, even after death.

explicitModifiers.text: +1 to Level of Socketed Strength Gems

lines.flavourText:
Swinging through the air, it sings
of sundered, severed, missing things.

lines.name: Kaom's Primacy

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 1 Rage on Critical Hit with attacks, no more than once every 0.5 seconds
Gain 1% of Physical Damage as Extra Fire Damage per 1 Rage

lines.flavourText:
One by one, Kaom slaughtered the weakest tribe
leaders until the others leapt to join his cause.

explicitModifiers.text: 15% chance to create Chilled Ground when you Freeze an Enemy

lines.flavourText:
Night's frost becomes morning's dew
Darkness cleansed, pure and new.

lines.name: Fate of the Vaal

explicitModifiers.text: 100% of Physical Damage from Hits with this Weapon is Converted to a random Element
Hits with this Weapon always Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Hits with this Weapon deal (30-59)% increased Damage to Ignited Enemies

Hits with this Weapon deal (30-59)% increased Damage to Shocked Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Doryani promises immortality, yet we build great structures, 
carve magnificent works into stone, so a part of us lives onward.
A sign of faithlessness through action.

lines.name: Hrimnor's Hymn

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

lines.flavourText:
"The crack of bone, the spray of blood.
Is there sweeter music?"
- Hrimnor of the Ezomytes.

lines.name: Ephemeral Edge

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have Added Maximum Lightning Damage equal to 20% of Player's Maximum Energy Shield

lines.flavourText:
In the rift between future and past,
life passes quickly.

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies Killed with Attack or Spell Hits Explode, dealing 10% of their Life as Fire Damage

lines.flavourText:
"The finest prosperity grows from the direst
carnage. Such is the nature of progress."
- Doryani of the Vaal

lines.flavourText:
The whispers of the dead
Carry wisdom for the living,
If you are willing to give your life
To listen.

Adds 3 to 5 Physical Damage to Attacks with this Weapon per 3 Player Levels

lines.flavourText: In every piece of prose, lies a tiny spark of magic.

lines.name: The Supreme Truth
lines.flavourText:
Knowledge brings power, and with power you can
grab truth by the throat and shape it as you wish.

lines.name: Rigwald's Charge

explicitModifiers.text: 15% increased Movement Speed if you've Killed Recently

lines.flavourText:
"Today, clansmen, my sword is my voice!"
- Rigwald, at the Battle of Glarryn

lines.name: Shiversting

explicitModifiers.text: 0.6% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana

lines.flavourText:
Stoic visage, icy heart.
Life of sorrow, lived apart.

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are supported by Level 30 Melee Splash

1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Enemies Killed by your Hits are destroyed

lines.flavourText:
Hinekora bound Kitava to a rock 
that Kitava could not lift with all his might.
Kitava vowed that when he broke free, 
he would devour every soul in Hinekora's domain.

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText: One for each corner of the great Vinktar Square.

explicitModifiers.text: Socketed Gems are Supported by Level 1 Lifetap
Enemies you Attack Reflect 100 Physical Damage to you

lines.flavourText:
The cuts on my hands are a small price to pay
for the opportunity to drive my steel
beyond the flesh and into the demon's soul.

lines.name: Geofri's Baptism
lines.flavourText:
"One quick tap is all the persuasion you'll need."
- Archbishop Geofri of Phrecia Cathedral

lines.name: Hezmana's Bloodlust

explicitModifiers.text: 1% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life

Attacks Cost Life instead of Mana

lines.flavourText: When a craving cannot be sated, any source will do.

lines.flavourText:
Lumbering as a sea lion, clumsy as a berry-drunk pigeon. That was Erqi. 
It mattered little. When Erqi's maul fell true, so did its target.

lines.flavourText:
Through droughts, fires, floods and frost,
the ancient giants stand resolute,
while deep in the rich, dark earth,
their grasp stretches ever farther.

- Administrator Qotra

debilitating effect from poisons. This could be very useful."

lines.flavourText:

an odour of evil. Nothing can shield the senses." 
- Researcher Arn

explicitModifiers.text: Gain an Endurance Charge, Frenzy Charge, and Power Charge when you use a Vaal Skill

lines.flavourText: Their three serpentine heads found unity in balance.

lines.flavourText:
Soon, the pleas for mercy were muted.
Only one voice remained.
Laughing.

Let it grow and gather inside them,
Let it flow through their veins.
Don't waste a drop.

Calling it poison would imply
that it was even edible.

explicitModifiers.text: 50% more Damage with Arrow Hits at Close Range

lines.flavourText:
As a soldier you want to get close to enemy archers.
That is not the case when fighting the Maraketh.

implicitModifiers.text: (20-24)% increased Elemental Damage with Attack Skills

explicitModifiers.text: Gain 100% of Weapon Physical Damage as Extra Damage of each Element

lines.flavourText:
"Toasted or frozen
Or twitching in the light
I'm not fussy
And neither is Death."
- Koralus Doomfletch

But black and white, good and evil, do exist,
and we must know how to recognize them."
- Archbishop Geofri

+1 to maximum number of Raised Zombies

A chilling hush, a scraping sound
Of things no more entombed in ground.
A shambling horde is on its way
To crush the very light of day.

to fight his way out. I don't know what we expected." 
- Researcher Graven

it seems surgery before thaumaturgy
was not so delicate."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 3546

"For the life of the flesh will always be in the blood."
- Atalui, Vaal Priestess

lines.name: Infractem

Mark us with mercy, then press on with care,
Execute us steadily, notch away at our despair.

the safest place to be is the centre.

lines.name: Cane of Unravelling

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: +(40-55)% to Chaos Damage over Time Multiplier
2% increased Cast Speed per Power Charge
+2 to Level of all Chaos Spell Skill Gems
Gain a Power Charge after Spending a total of 200 Mana
Regenerate 2 Mana per Second per Power Charge

lines.flavourText:
"Creation is the act of making the intangible tangible.
To work backwards, to make the tangible intangible,
is to step into the mind of a god."
- Doryani, Queen's Thaumaturgist

lines.name: Balefire
lines.flavourText:
After the fires swept down from the sky and swallowed the city,
all that lingered, as if locked in time,
was a memory of that which was gone, a whisper of deeds undone.

lines.name: Ahn's Might

explicitModifiers.text: +50% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have no Frenzy Charges
+(400-500) to Accuracy Rating while at Maximum Frenzy Charges

lines.flavourText:
"Impossibly heavy, yet the ancient edge is as keen as any modern blade's.
A reminder that, in the end, when we lie in the bellies of worms,
it is what we make that makes us."
- Icius Perandus, Antiquities Collection, Item 47

lines.name: Vulconus

explicitModifiers.text: 50% chance to cause Bleeding on Hit
(70-100)% increased Fire Damage with Hits and Ailments against Bleeding Enemies
(70-100)% increased Physical Damage with Hits and Ailments against Ignited Enemies
Every 8 seconds, gain Avatar of Fire for 4 seconds
(160-200)% increased Critical Strike Chance while you have Avatar of Fire
50% of Physical Damage Converted to Fire while you have Avatar of Fire
+2000 Armour while you do not have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
Lava bled from the earth and,
after a time, cooled and hardened.
The world protecting its beating heart 
with a thick, black scab.

lines.name: Augyre

explicitModifiers.text: 50% of Physical Damage Converted to Lightning Damage
Every 16 seconds you gain Elemental Overload for 8 seconds
You have Resolute Technique while you do not have Elemental Overload
100% increased Physical Damage while you have Resolute Technique

lines.flavourText:
When the world spins out of control,
the safest place to be is in the centre.

lines.name: Earendel's Embrace

explicitModifiers.text: Summoned Skeletons Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit
Summoned Skeletons take (15.1-30)% of their Maximum Life per second as Fire Damage
Summoned Skeletons have Avatar of Fire

lines.flavourText:
There the weary multitude of man-kind 
shall turn in their masses into the wide fire, 
where the destroying flame embraces the living, 
some will go up, some down, filled with misery.

lines.name: Sinvicta's Mettle

explicitModifiers.text: 2% increased Area of Effect per 25 Rampage Kills
Gain a Frenzy Charge on every 50th Rampage Kill

lines.flavourText:
War is a thriving infection.
It numbs the heart and eats away at the soul
until only emptiness remains.

lines.name: Soulwrest

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: Trigger Level 20 Summon Phantasm Skill when you Consume a corpse
Minions deal (45-51) to (66-78) additional Physical Damage
If you Consumed a corpse Recently, you and nearby Allies Regenerate 5% of Life per second

lines.flavourText: Death is but the start of your servitude.

lines.name: The Grey Spire

implicitModifiers.text: +20% Chance to Block Spell Damage while wielding a Staff

lines.flavourText:
There was never a simpler time.
Just simpler motivations.

lines.name: Sign of the Sin Eater

explicitModifiers.text: Enemies inflict Elemental Ailments on you instead of nearby Allies

lines.flavourText: A secret few among the Templars grant absolution by bearing the guilt of others.

lines.name: The Black Cane

explicitModifiers.text: Each Summoned Phantasm grants you Phantasmal Might

lines.flavourText: Lead the army of the damned from the front.

lines.name: Wings of Entropy

explicitModifiers.text: +(8-12)% Chance to Block Attack Damage while Dual Wielding
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Fire Damage in Main Hand
Adds (75-100) to (165-200) Chaos Damage in Off Hand

lines.flavourText: Fire and Anarchy are the most reliable agents of change.

lines.name: Goblinedge

explicitModifiers.text: (20-25)% increased Attack Speed if you haven't gained a Frenzy Charge Recently
(60-80)% increased Critical Strike Chance if you haven't gained a Power Charge Recently
+3 seconds to Duration of Frenzy and Power Charges on Culling Strike

lines.flavourText:
"That bronze girl sure knows how to cut someone down to size!"
- Bertrand the Plush

lines.name: The Gluttonous Tide

explicitModifiers.text: Lose all Frenzy Charges on reaching Maximum Frenzy Charges to make the next Bow Attack you perform fire that many additional Arrows
+(30-50)% Global Critical Strike Multiplier while you have a Frenzy Charge
(20-40)% chance to gain a Frenzy Charge for each Enemy you hit with a Critical Strike

lines.flavourText:
To eat, to feast, to forget the horror of endless agonising existence
if but for a moment... only to disgorge and do it all again...

lines.name: Widowhail

explicitModifiers.text: (150-250)% increased bonuses gained from Equipped Quiver

lines.flavourText:
"I loosed a volley of arrows into the heart of the man
who slew my beloved. There was no satisfaction, no
healing, no revenge. There was only... emptiness."
- Chieftainess Ahuana of the Ramako Tribe

lines.name: Ashcaller

explicitModifiers.text: 25% chance to Trigger Level 10 Summon Raging Spirit on Kill
Adds (20-24) to (38-46) Fire Damage to Spells
10% chance to Cover Enemies in Ash on Hit

lines.flavourText:
"We do not command fire.
Ngamahu lends it, and Hinekora returns it."
- Lavianga, Advisor to Kaom

lines.name: Storm Prison

implicitModifiers.text: Adds (1-2) to (9-11) Lightning Damage to Spells and Attacks

explicitModifiers.text: (25-35)% chance to gain a Power Charge on Kill

lines.flavourText:
You can never truly tame the tempest.
You can barely even leash it.

lines.name: Eclipse Solaris

explicitModifiers.text: (120-140)% increased Critical Strike Chance against Blinded Enemies

lines.flavourText:
Every decade, Lunaris devours Solaris
Each time, Solaris emerges from Lunaris, born anew.

lines.name: Piscator's Vigil

explicitModifiers.text: Attacks with this Weapon have (100-115)% increased Elemental Damage
Damage with Weapons Penetrates 5% Elemental Resistances

lines.flavourText:
"Stone still, amidst the reeds,
breath fogging in the iron cold air. 
he sits, he waits, he watches. 
A piscatorial vigil, sat by the river, 
his cathedral, his patience his unanswered prayer."
- Jojoba Mansell, bard, angler, adventurer

lines.name: Obliteration

explicitModifiers.text: Gain (30-40)% of Physical Damage as Extra Chaos Damage
Enemies you Kill have a 20% chance to Explode, dealing a quarter of their maximum Life as Chaos Damage

lines.flavourText:
We forge order from the world around us
Wielding anarchy and destruction as our tools of genesis.

lines.name: Apep's Rage

explicitModifiers.text: Adds (90-130) to (140-190) Chaos Damage to Spells
Poisons you inflict deal Damage (30-50)% faster
Lose 40 Mana when you use a Skill

lines.flavourText:
Apep's poison entraps, encircles,
and engulfs the leaking mind of Man.

lines.name: Nametaker

explicitModifiers.text: 2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Life
2% of Physical Attack Damage Leeched as Mana
Hits with this Weapon have +10% to Critical Strike Multiplier per Enemy Power
5% of Leech from Hits with this Weapon is Instant per Enemy Power

lines.flavourText:
It need not know your True Name. Our most
dearly held secrets spill forth in our blood.

lines.name: Pillar of the Caged God

implicitModifiers.text: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

explicitModifiers.text: 1% increased Area of Effect per 20 Intelligence
16% increased Physical Weapon Damage per 10 Strength

lines.flavourText:
Forged to rule the waves and tide
Destined to serve the monkey's paw
Strong as a tower of iron
Deft as the needle doubt
